text: @OliverDowden You lying bastard. He did not follow guidelines. Is auntie Boris telling his entire cabinet to tell us that pansy cummings followed the rules? Like hell he did. "I know let's drive 250 miles with two people who have covid-19 and fuck up anyone we come across" #corrupttorygvt
